channel.title: Academics on FalconBlog
channel.description: Recent content in Academics on FalconBlog

item.title: Day 29
item.description:
📅 June 29, 2025 – Sunday

  • 📚 Studied Engineering Electromagnetics: Dedicated 2+ hours to revising key concepts. Focused particularly on Maxwell’s equations and wave propagation.
  • 🧠 Final Attempt at GCTF Challenges: Took one last shot at solving the remaining Google CTF questions. It was a mentally stimulating session.
  • 📝 Module Assignment Form: Created and circulated a Google Form to gather module preferences or updates from the team. It will help streamline project responsibilities moving forward.

A productive day of both academic and CTF-related progress, with a strong sense of closure as the month nears its end.
